H0.text: What was the terrorist group responsible for the 1972 Munich Olympic massacre of Israeli athletes. PLO (Palestine Liberation Organization)

H1.text: What was the terrorist group responsible for the 1972 Munich Olympic massacre of Israeli athletes. Fatah

H2.text: What was the terrorist group responsible for the 1972 Munich Olympic massacre of Israeli athletes. PFLP (Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine)

H3.text: What was the terrorist group responsible for the 1972 Munich Olympic massacre of Israeli athletes. Black September

A4.text: The Munich massacre was carried out by eight members of the Palestinian militant organisation Black September.
